name: best.crux.core
description: Provides custom editors and a documentation viewer for all of my packages

samples.description: An example set of documentation pages, including demonstrations of things like alert boxes and asset-pinging buttons.
A demo of how scene-view icons can be automatically disabled with the [HideIcon] attribute
Shows various usages of tooltip and manual buttons, plus Reveal Areas
A demo of various prefixes for things like the Create Asset Menu
Examples of the upgradable data system, including overrides and custom property drawers
